//! Test helper functions
//!
//! This module provides utility functions for testing,
//! including setup/teardown helpers and assertion utilities.

pub mod setup;

use std::time::Duration;
use tokio::time::timeout;

/// Run a future with a timeout
pub async fn with_timeout<F, T>(future: F, duration: Duration) -> Result<T, &'static str>
where
    F: std::future::Future<Output = T>,
{
    match timeout(duration, future).await {
        Ok(result) => Ok(result),
        Err(_) => Err("Operation ti
